output-frames.label: Ouput frames
output-frames.info: If checked, the specified number of frames will be recorded as screenshots and saved to disk. Per default, they are saved in the user/screenshots folder. This feature can not be used together with 'loop playback.

record-session.title: Record
record-session.overwrite-checkbox-tooltip: If you enter a filename that already exists, this checkbox allows you to overwrite the existing file.
